name: The Fool
desc: The Fool strides bravely forward, unaware of the dangers that surround him. Yet is this blissful ignorance the key to something profound?

name: The Hanged Man
desc: The Hanged Man tells of danger ahead. A wise traveler heeds this warning, too late for its messenger.

name: The Star
desc: The Star signals a bitch better step up or they bout to get shot
